item.title: Safety Command: ##FINAL_RECAP
item.description:
Safety Command: ##FINAL_RECAP

Summary: Mandatory end-of-session command that generates a structured, saveable summary so data never dies inside the chat window.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batch 5

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
